content: with this free crochet pattern work up your new favourite fingerless gloves the are very delicate and excellent fitting the gloves are worked in the round including the thumb the pattern is written in us and uk english as well as in dutch and includes detailed pictures to guide you through thanks to milla there s a finnish translation here 1 and a spanish translation coming soon 2 for a chunky version of this pattern please have a look 3 1 https //meandyarn wordpress com/2015/11/04/kammekkaat/ 2 http //hastaelmonyo com/ 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/chunky-fingerless-gloves-2
